name: Blitz (itch) (joelmoore24)
description:
This is my first gameboy color game and I wanted to try something a bit simple while I figured things out. The game is fairly straightforward, you roll two dice, add them up and you have to put down a certain amount of tiles that add up to that number. If you make a roll and can't put down the correct number you lose, but if you put down all the tiles you win and get a cool surprise at the end!

Controls:

  • A - Roll and move a tile down
  • B - Move a tile up
  • Left/Right - Move arrow left and right

I tested the game on Visual Boy and Emulicious as well as physical hardware.
